name: Triamid Pathfinder
text: You can discard this card from your hand; add 1 "Triamid" Field Spell Card from your Deck to your hand, and if you do, draw 1 card. You can only activate this effect of "Triamid Pathfinder" once per turn. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Triamid" Field Spell Card in your Field Zone; send it to the GY, and if you do, activate 1 "Triamid" Field Spell Card from your Deck with a different name.
